Types

BufferedReader = object
  filename: string
  file: File
  readBuffer: seq[uint8]
  endianness: Endianness
  swapEndian: bool

BufferedReaderError = object of Exception
BufferedWriter = object
  filename: string
  file: File
  writeBuffer: seq[uint8]
  endianness: Endianness
  swapEndian: bool

BufferedWriterError = object of Exception

Procs

proc openFile(file: File; bufSize: Natural = 4096; endianness = littleEndian): BufferedReader {...}{.
    raises: [], tags: [].}
proc openFile(filename: string; bufSize: Natural = 4096; endianness = littleEndian;
             writeAccess = false): BufferedReader {...}{.raises: [BufferedReaderError],
    tags: [].}
proc close(br: var BufferedReader) {...}{.raises: [BufferedReaderError], tags: [].}
proc readString(br: var BufferedReader; len: Natural): string {...}{.
    raises: [BufferedReaderError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}

proc readInt8(br: var BufferedReader): int8 {...}{.
    raises: [BufferedReaderError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Reads a single int8 value from the current file position. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors. 
proc readInt16(br: var BufferedReader): int16 {...}{.
    raises: [BufferedReaderError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Reads a single int16 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors. 
proc readInt32(br: var BufferedReader): int32 {...}{.
    raises: [BufferedReaderError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Reads a single int32 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors. 
proc readInt64(br: var BufferedReader): int64 {...}{.
    raises: [BufferedReaderError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Reads a single int64 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors. 
proc readUInt8(br: var BufferedReader): uint8 {...}{.
    raises: [BufferedReaderError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Reads a single uint8 value from the current file position. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors. 
proc readUInt16(br: var BufferedReader): uint16 {...}{.
    raises: [BufferedReaderError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Reads a single uint16 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors.

    raises: [BufferedReaderError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Reads a single uint32 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors.

    raises: [BufferedReaderError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Reads a single uint64 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors. 
proc readFloat32(br: var BufferedReader): float32 {...}{.
    raises: [BufferedReaderError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Reads a single float32 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors. 
proc readFloat64(br: var BufferedReader): float64 {...}{.
    raises: [BufferedReaderError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Reads a single float64 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors. 
proc readData(br: var BufferedReader; dest: var openArray[int8 | uint8]; len: Natural)
Reads len number of int8|uint8 values into dest from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors. 
proc readData(br: var BufferedReader; dest: var openArray[int16 | uint16]; len: Natural)
Reads len number of int16|uint16 values into dest from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors. 
proc readData(br: var BufferedReader; dest: var openArray[int32 | uint32 | float32];
             len: Natural)
Reads len number of int32|uint32|float32 values into dest from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors. 
proc readData(br: var BufferedReader; dest: var openArray[int64 | uint64 | float64];
             len: Natural)
Reads len number of int64|uint64|float64 values into dest from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a BufferedReaderError on read errors. 
proc readData(br: var BufferedReader; data: var openArray[int8 | uint8])
Shortcut to fill the whole data buffer with data. 
proc readData(br: var BufferedReader; data: var openArray[
    int16 | uint16 | int32 | uint32 | int64 | uint64 | float32 | float64])
Shortcut to fill the whole data buffer with data.
